contextId.information: These two phrases refer to everyone from one extreme to the other. AT: "no matter how important they were" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
contextId.quote: from the least to the greatest

contextId.information: The words "heaven" and "earth" are used together to mean all beings and things in heaven and earth. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
